Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Wildfire:







Wildfire wasn't willing to follow Shredder. Somewhere inside his mind, he 
was lying. There was something deep inside his mind that he had hidden. She 
didn't like him, and she didn't like the other bot either. She backed up and 
turned, running. She kicked up her hooves. Behind her, she left a lingering 
image of a blanket of darkness. It was her way of hiding herself when she 
made her retreat.
